page.title: 15Gargrave, Parish Council.
page.content:
Matters under recent consideration have included:- {Travelling People}-These came and settled on {Low Green}and caused a mess with the scrap metal they were collecting. Last year posts had to be put round{Middle Green} to discourage them. Now some way has to be found to keep them off Low Green. {B.M.X.Track}-To be built on the{ {Playing Field}(provided by the{ {Coulthurst Trust}) for an experimental period of six months.
The council also considered noisy Motor Bikes, Dog dirt, Street Lighting and various planning applications.
